quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
name: Lord Byron

quote: A friendship that like love is warm A love like friendship, steady.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: I'll love you, dear, I'll love you till China and Africa meet and the river jumps over the mountain and the salmon sing in the street.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
name: Frank Morgan

quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
name: Emma Goldman

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
name: Willa Cather

quote: The Eskimos had fifty-two names for snow because it was important to them: there ought to be as many for love.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: Husbands are like fires - they go out when they're left unattended.
name: Cher

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
name: Erich Segal

quote: Now a soft kiss - Aye, by that kiss, I vow an endless bliss.
name: John Keats

quote: Today is Valentine's Day - or, as men like to call it, Extortion Day!
name: Jay Leno

quote: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: I love romance. I'm a sucker for it. I love it so much. It's pathetic.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: Sometimes I'm so sweet even I can't stand it.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: I want a man who's kind and understanding. Is that too much to ask of a millionaire?
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I love bringing roses to a woman when she least expects it.
name: Esai Morales

quote: So, fall asleep love, loved by me... for I know love, I am loved by thee.
name: Robert Browning

quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
name: Fred Allen

quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: Some women flirt more with what they say, and some with what they do.
name: Anna Held

quote: I'm into all that sappy stuff - a surprise picnic, nice dinner, or traveling. I'm kind of an old romantic.
name: Will Estes

quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to have to do forty pounds of laundry a week.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: How sweet it is!
name: Jackie Gleason

quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
name: Luciano De Crescenzo

quote: Everything's coming up roses - for me.
name: Ethel Merman

quote: In a recent Valentine's Day posting on her fan website, Britney Spears says that - oh, who cares?
name: Amy Poehler

quote: I'm like the kid in kindergarten I really do send valentines to everyone.
name: Susie Bright

quote: I like perfume and flowers.
name: Donatella Versace

quote: Look, there's no metaphysics on earth like chocolates.
name: Fernando Pessoa

quote: Love is when the desire to be desired takes you so badly that you feel you could die of it.
name: Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec

quote: I'm a laugh tart. I make no secret of that fact.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: I used to be a hopeless romantic - I fell in love with everyone I went out with.
name: Jeremy London

quote: Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine.
name: Christopher Plummer
